Summary The BrightRoll Video DSP - now part of Yahoo!, ( acquired December 2014 for $650M+ ) is the largest, best in class, video platform. Brad now, as head of the auto vertical at Yahoo, works with agencies and brands to understand the BR DSP, along with Yahoo's various other platforms in native, social, premium content, etc.  
 
Brad is a dynamic executive leader with over two decades of digital and programmatic / rtb media platform experience. His extensive management and build out background, from early stage startups to large media companies, has provided a keen insight in to team development. Brad's track record is unparalleled for meeting and exceeding revenue objectives, developing client direct partnerships, advertiser usage of current technology based solutions and media platforms.  
 
Brad is a constant on media and platform speaking circle, having presented at multiple industry events, such as Programmatic IO, iMedia, Digiday, etc. He is also an avid blogger and outspoken contributor in the video ecosystem.  
 
He commands a thoughtful, strategic, analytical approach to planning around business, along with an aggressive leadership stance when positioning his company, hiring best in class people, etc. He believes you have to lead from the front - guide, nurture and educate your team, providing a cultural halo of excellence that promotes successful business attainment.  
 
Responsibilities, both current and historical, entail: 
 
-Large team management where focus is positioning of media and programmatic platforms in social, native, video, etc.  
* Forecasting, goal setting and annualized planning for company revenue growth attainment, OpEx oversight and P&L management and YOY growth strategies, account planning, etc.  
* SaaS like programmatic platform positioning to agencies, trading desks, brands and HOK ( Hands on Keyboards ) customers.  
* Cross functional internal navigation and leadership engagement with Product, Marketing, Engineering, BizOps teams, etc.
